name: Wayne Gretzky
biography: Played for Oilers, Kings, Blues, Rangers. Known as the greatest hockey player ever.

name: Mario Lemieux
biography: Played entire career with the Pittsburgh Penguins. Known for his scoring talent and overcoming health issues.

name: Gordie Howe
biography: Mr. Hockey. Played for Detroit Red Wings and Hartford Whalers. Known for longevity and toughness.

name: Bobby Orr
biography: Revolutionized the defenseman position with the Boston Bruins. Won two Stanley Cups.

name: Jaromir Jagr
biography: Played for Penguins, Capitals, Rangers, and more. Known for his longevity and scoring.

name: Sidney Crosby
biography: Captain of the Pittsburgh Penguins. Three-time Stanley Cup winner and Olympic gold medalist.

name: Alex Ovechkin
biography: Captain of the Washington Capitals. One of the greatest goal scorers in NHL history.

name: Mark Messier
biography: Led both Oilers and Rangers to Stanley Cups. Famous for leadership and toughness.

name: Steve Yzerman
biography: Captain of the Detroit Red Wings for two decades. Three-time Stanley Cup champion.

name: Patrick Roy
biography: Legendary goaltender for the Canadiens and Avalanche. Known for clutch playoff performances.

name: Dominik Hasek
biography: Goaltender known as 'The Dominator.' Played for Sabres and Red Wings. Two-time Hart Trophy winner.

name: Joe Sakic
biography: Captain of the Colorado Avalanche. Led team to two Stanley Cups.

name: Ray Bourque
biography: Legendary defenseman for Bruins and Avalanche. Won Stanley Cup late in career.

name: Jean Beliveau
biography: Montreal Canadiens captain. Won 10 Stanley Cups as a player.

name: Mike Bossy
biography: New York Islanders winger. Known for scoring and four straight Cups.

name: Martin Brodeur
biography: All-time winningest goalie with the New Jersey Devils. Three-time Stanley Cup champion.

name: Nicklas Lidstrom
biography: Legendary Red Wings defenseman. Won four Stanley Cups and seven Norris Trophies.

name: Brett Hull
biography: Known for his incredible shot. Played for Blues, Stars, and others.

name: Phil Esposito
biography: Star for the Boston Bruins and New York Rangers. Five-time scoring champ.

name: Pavel Bure
biography: Known as the Russian Rocket. Speedy winger for Canucks, Panthers, and Rangers.

name: Chris Chelios
biography: Defenseman who played until age 48. Three-time Stanley Cup winner.

name: Doug Gilmour
biography: Known for grit and leadership. Played for the Maple Leafs, Flames, and more.

name: Teemu Selanne
biography: The Finnish Flash. Rookie goal record holder and Stanley Cup champion.

name: Henrik Lundqvist
biography: The King. Star goalie for the New York Rangers with Olympic gold.

name: Zdeno Chara
biography: Tallest player in NHL history. Captain of the Boston Bruins for a Stanley Cup win.

name: Peter Forsberg
biography: Colorado Avalanche star known for skill and physical play. Two-time Cup winner.

name: Sergei Fedorov
biography: Elite two-way player. Star for Detroit Red Wings and three-time Stanley Cup champion.

name: Ron Francis
biography: Second all-time in assists when retired. Captain of the Hartford Whalers and Hurricanes.

name: Jerome Iginla
biography: Calgary Flames star and two-time Olympic gold medalist. Known for power forward play.

name: Connor McDavid
biography: One of the fastest and most skilled players ever. Captain of the Edmonton Oilers.
